text: Here's a young lady, that I see
do you have time, to listen tp the stroy of some old dunkar
are you still I hight school ?

answers.text: Yeah... bout'that my father told me to speak not to stranger, especially the one smelling alcohol
well it;s not like I have somthing else to do...
I am, listen I need to leave

dialogue.text: and so she leave, as did her mother do at her time, what an eternel loop of this existance

dialogue: if I know your mother ?
well no, but I know what it is to be young
I know how you think you are diferent from us, old lad

dialogue.text: I was young too, you know what was my dream at your age ?

dialogue: be realisator, I've learn letter, I've watch a shit ton of movie
especially SF, Brobi the Brobo, apes 21, underground cops
well turn out watch movie don't make you a realisator

dialogue.text: I've learn to film, how sound work, do you know to what it lead me ?

answers: so you've stop been a dentist ?
well at last you still see camera

dialogue: got a wife, 2 child what an happy familly
I've dream to film alien fighting in space
I've film babies walking at home
and I'm happy you know, won't change the world
I've change my mind, it's not like been a cineast is posible for
someone like me, at leat my life has a purpose
I've create life...
but god, I miss this time when all was posible
I could imagine be in space, make my movie, been a scientist
sure I was full of doubte, but my avenir was full of posibility
girl, you think you're young, but listen
your futur is at it's best now, the more you grown up
the less you'll dream about tomorow
the present absorbe you in an infernal spiral, and all of your dream
are postbone to a tomarow that never come, and you go to work
and you go to vacation, bring your child to school
but someday you'll will continue your prject
and when you finally get time, all your imagination have fade away
so here's my advice girl:
enjoy your present, because it is awesome !
